name: Horde Beat
description:
Made for Council of the Bros Halloween Jam in 48 Hours.

Design, Art and Music: DiCocco
Theme: Trick or Treat!

Outrun the slowly multiplying zombie horde while collecting your hard earned candy.

Controls: WASD to Move

It's just a small arcade game, which was a lot of fun to create. I had some ideas I did want to add, like costume changes which act as power ups, but I had to constrain myself. First and foremost, it's much more important to just keep the scope small and finishing a project.
